metadata.title: Power Platform Fundamentals
metadata.subtitle: Build low-code solutions with Microsoft Power Platform
metadata.description: Learn to create business solutions using Power BI, Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power Virtual Agents. No coding experience required.

overview.summary: Power Platform Fundamentals introduces you to the capabilities of Microsoft Power Platform. Learn to build apps, automate workflows, analyze data, and create chatbots without writing code.
objectives: Understand Power Platform components and capabilities
Create canvas and model-driven apps with Power Apps
Build automated workflows with Power Automate
Create data visualizations with Power BI
Develop chatbots with Power Virtual Agents
overview.targetAudience: Business analysts, IT professionals, and business users who want to create solutions using Microsoft Power Platform and prepare for the PL-900 certification.

modules.title: Power Platform Overview

sections.content: Microsoft Power Platform is a suite of low-code tools that empowers everyone to analyze data, build solutions, automate processes, and create virtual agents.

faq.question: Do I need programming experience?
faq.answer: No, Power Platform is designed for users without programming experience. You'll learn visual development techniques.

faq.question: What can I build with Power Platform?
faq.answer: You can build mobile apps, automate business processes, create data visualizations, and develop chatbots.

faq.question: Is Power Platform included in Microsoft 365?
faq.answer: Basic Power Platform capabilities are included in some Microsoft 365 licenses, but advanced features require separate licensing.
